faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Find answers about how our AI helps you create, customize, and export professional presentations with ease.
faq.0_answer: Flexible Generation allows you to start with a simple prompt or document upload, letting our AI handle the layout and design, saving you time and effort.
faq.1_question: What do I need for AI Template Generation?
faq.1_answer: Simply upload your existing PowerPoint file, and our AI will create a matching template, streamlining your presentation process.
faq.2_question: What formats are supported for exporting my presentations?
faq.2_answer: You can export your presentations in both PowerPoint (PPTX) and PDF formats, ensuring compatibility and ease of sharing with your audience or team members.
